Part.Source:
&CustomProperty = new()
&CustomProperty.Id = "LDAPpath" &CustomProperty.Token = "LDAPpath" &CustomProperty.Value = "LDAP://concepto.com.uy/OU=Usuarios,OU=Concepto,DC=concepto,DC=com,DC=uy" &AdditionalParameter.Properties.Add(&CustomProperty)
&CustomProperty = new() &CustomProperty.Id = "LDAPFilter" &CustomProperty.Token = "LDAPFilter" &CustomProperty.Value = "(&(memberOf=CN=usuarios_mt,OU=Listas Distribucion,OU=Concepto,DC=concepto,DC=com,DC=uy)(CN="+ &UserName +"))" &AdditionalParameter.Properties.Add(&CustomProperty)
Do Case Case &KeepMeLoggedIn &AdditionalParameter.RememberUserType = GAMRememberUserTypes.Authentication Case &RememberMe &AdditionalParameter.RememberUserType = GAMRememberUserTypes.Login Otherwise &AdditionalParameter.RememberUserType = GAMRememberUserTypes.None EndCase
&AdditionalParameter.AuthenticationTypeName = &LogOnTo // Login User ////////////////////////////////////////////// &LoginOK = GAMRepository.Login(&UserName, &UserPassword, &AdditionalParameter, &Errors ) If &LoginOK //Get my custom application data in json format //////////// //The &ApplicationData is saved in the Login action when authentication type is "Web service" or "Custom" &ApplicationData = GAMSession.GetApplicationData() If not &ApplicationData.IsEmpty() &GAMExampleSDTApplicationData.FromJson(&ApplicationData) Endif ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// &ret = setuserid(&UserName.ToUpper()) &URL = GAMRepository.GetLastErrorsURL() If &URL.IsEmpty() GAMApplication.GoHome() Else Link(&URL) Endif //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// Else If &Errors.Count > 0 Do Case Case (&Errors.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserPasswordExpired OR &Errors.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserPasswordMustBeChanged) //Webpanel to Change Password GAMExampleChangePassword(&ApplicationClientId) Case &Errors.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserMissingRequiredData //Webpanel to Complete User data GAMExampleUpdateRegisterUser(&ApplicationClientId) Otherwise Do 'DisplayMessages' EndCase EndIf Endif
Sub 'DisplayMessages'
For &Error in &Errors If &Error.Code <> GAMErrorMessages.SessionExpired Msg(Format(!"%1 (GAM%2)", &Error.Message, &Error.Code)) Endif EndFor
EndSub

Event Start CurrentRepository.Visible = false //Used when multiple repository connections exist &isOK = GAM.CheckConnection() &ConnectionInfoCollection = GAM.GetConnections() If not &isOK If &ConnectionInfoCollection.Count > 0 //The first connection found is established by default &isOK = GAM.SetConnection(&ConnectionInfoCollection.Item(1).Name, &Errors) EndIf Endif If &ConnectionInfoCollection.Count > 1 &GAMRepository = GAMrepository.Get() CurrentRepository.Caption = "Repository: " + &GAMRepository.Name CurrentRepository.Visible = true EndIf
Do 'DisplayExternalAuthentications' EndEvent
Event Refresh &isRedirect = False //Gets last error in the GAM &ErrorsLogin = GAMRepository.GetLastErrors() If &ErrorsLogin.Count > 0 Do Case Case &ErrorsLogin.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.ConnectionNotSpecified //DO NOT display these messages Case (&ErrorsLogin.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserPasswordExpired OR &ErrorsLogin.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserPasswordMustBeChanged) //Webpanel to Change Password GAMExampleChangePassword(&ApplicationClientId) &isRedirect = True Case &ErrorsLogin.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserMissingRequiredData //Webpanel to Complete User data GAMExampleUpdateRegisterUser(&ApplicationClientId) &isRedirect = True Otherwise &UserPassword.SetEmpty() &Errors = &ErrorsLogin Do 'DisplayMessages' EndCase Endif
If not &isRedirect //Gets last error in GAM &SessionValid = GAMSession.IsValid(&Session, &Errors)
If &SessionValid and not &Session.IsAnonymous &URL = GAMRepository.GetLastErrorsURL() If &URL.IsEmpty() GAMRepository.ApplicationGoHome(GAMInternalGUIDs.AppGAMUserBackend) &Errors = GAMRepository.GetLastErrors() Do 'DisplayMessages' Else Link(&URL) Endif Else //List Log on to &LogOnTo.Clear() &AuthenticationTypes = GAMRepository.GetEnabledAuthenticationTypes(&Language, &Errors) For &AuthenticationType in &AuthenticationTypes If &AuthenticationType.NeedUserName //Authentication types you must enter the username in this web panel &LogOnTo.AddItem(&AuthenticationType.Name, &AuthenticationType.Description) EndIf EndFor If &LogOnTo.Count <= 1 &LogOnTo.Visible = False Else &LogOnTo = &AuthenticationTypes.Item(1).Name Endif
//Initialize variables if the user chooses to keep that information &isOK = GAMRepository.GetRememberLogin(&LogOnTo, &UserName, &UserRememberMe, &Errors) If &UserRememberMe = GAMRememberUserTypes.Login &RememberMe = True Endif
//Select Default Authentication Type, Display Remember User if it is enabled on Repository &Repository = GAMRepository.Get() If &LogOnTo.Count > 1 &LogOnTo = &Repository.DefaultAuthenticationTypeName Endif Do Case Case &Repository.UserRememberMeType = GAMRepositoryRememberUserTypes.Login &RememberMe.Visible = True Case &Repository.UserRememberMeType = GAMRepositoryRememberUserTypes.Authentication &KeepMeLoggedIn.Visible = True Case &Repository.UserRememberMeType = GAMRepositoryRememberUserTypes.Both &RememberMe.Visible = True &KeepMeLoggedIn.Visible = True Otherwise &RememberMe.Visible = False &KeepMeLoggedIn.Visible = False EndCase
EndIf Endif EndEvent
Event Enter //Set Remember User type Do Case Case &KeepMeLoggedIn &AdditionalParameter.RememberUserType = GAMRememberUserTypes.Authentication Case &RememberMe &AdditionalParameter.RememberUserType = GAMRememberUserTypes.Login Otherwise &AdditionalParameter.RememberUserType = GAMRememberUserTypes.None EndCase
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //Send Custom Properties (optional) //////////////////////// //&CustomProperty.Id = "branch" //&CustomProperty.Value = "120" //&AdditionalParameter.Properties.Add(&CustomProperty) ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
&AdditionalParameter.AuthenticationTypeName = &LogOnTo
//Login User &LoginOK = GAMRepository.Login(&UserName, &UserPassword, &AdditionalParameter, &Errors ) If &LoginOK //Get my custom application data in json format
//The &ApplicationData is saved in the Login action when authentication type is "Web service" or "Custom" &ApplicationData = GAMSession.GetApplicationData() If not &ApplicationData.IsEmpty() &GAMExampleSDTApplicationData.FromJson(&ApplicationData) Endif
&URL = GAMRepository.GetLastErrorsURL() If &URL.IsEmpty() GAMRepository.ApplicationGoHome(GAMInternalGUIDs.AppGAMUserBackend) &Errors = GAMRepository.GetLastErrors() Do 'DisplayMessages' Else Link(&URL) Endif
Else If &Errors.Count > 0 Do Case Case (&Errors.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserPasswordExpired OR &Errors.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserPasswordMustBeChanged) //Webpanel to Change Password GAMExampleChangePassword(&ApplicationClientId) Case &Errors.Item(1).Code = GAMErrorMessages.UserMissingRequiredData //Webpanel to Complete User data GAMExampleUpdateRegisterUser(&ApplicationClientId) Otherwise &UserPassword.SetEmpty() Do 'DisplayMessages' EndCase EndIf Endif EndEvent
Sub 'DisplayMessages' For &Error in &Errors If &Error.Code <> GAMErrorMessages.SessionExpired Msg(Format(!"%1 (GAM%2)", &Error.Message, &Error.Code)) Endif EndFor EndSub
Event 'ForgotPassword' GAMExampleRecoverPasswordStep1(&ApplicationClientId) EndEvent
Event 'Register' GAMExampleRegisterUser() EndEvent
Event ButtonFacebook.Click GAMRepository.LoginFacebook() EndEvent
Event ButtonGoogle.Click GAMRepository.LoginGoogle() EndEvent
Event ButtonTwitter.Click GAMRepository.LoginTwitter() EndEvent
Event ButtonGAMRemote.Click GAMRepository.LoginGAMRemote() EndEvent
Sub 'DisplayExternalAuthentications' Buttons.Visible = False If GAMRepository.CanAuthenticateWith(GAMAuthenticationTypes.Facebook) ButtonFacebook.Visible = True Buttons.Visible = True Else ButtonFacebook.Visible = False Endif If GAMRepository.CanAuthenticateWith(GAMAuthenticationTypes.Google) ButtonGoogle.Visible = True Buttons.Visible = True Else ButtonGoogle.Visible = False Endif If GAMRepository.CanAuthenticateWith(GAMAuthenticationTypes.Twitter) ButtonTwitter.Visible = True Buttons.Visible = True Else ButtonTwitter.Visible = False Endif If GAMRepository.CanAuthenticateWith(GAMAuthenticationTypes.GAMRemote) ButtonGAMRemote.Visible = True Buttons.Visible = True Else ButtonGAMRemote.Visible = False Endif EndSub
